alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Crisp; Dooly; Houston; Pulaski; Sumter; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 04 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Pulaski, southern Twiggs, Dooly, western Bleckley, Houston, eastern Sumter and western Crisp Counties through 830 AM EST... At 759 AM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Houston Lake to near Smithville, and moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Perry, Cordele, Hawkinsville, Vienna, Warner Robins, Unadilla, Byromville, Pinehurst, Leslie, Lilly, De Soto, Dooling, Desoto, Cobb, Sumter, Lamar, Hayneville, Houston Lake, Mock Springs and Drayton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon EST for central and west central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Bleckley; Crisp; Dooly; Houston; Pulaski; Sumter; Twiggs
